title: Yobi, The Five Tailed Fox
description: A mystical fox spirit named Yobi lives among humans and hides her identity while helping a boy.

title: Leafie, A Hen into the Wild
description: A brave hen escapes captivity to live in the wild and raise a duckling as her own.

title: The King of Pigs
description: Two men revisit their violent school days and the bullying that shaped them.

title: Green Days: Dinosaur and I
description: A nostalgic story about a girlâ€™s first love and growing up in rural Korea.

title: Underdog
description: A group of abandoned dogs escape and search for freedom in the wild.

title: Pororo, The Racing Adventure
description: Pororo dreams of becoming a race car driver and competes in an international race.

title: My Beautiful Girl, Mari
description: A boy escapes to a dream world with a mysterious girl named Mari during a tough time in his life.

title: Aachi & Ssipak
description: In a bizarre future, two street punks battle over a girl with powers related to energy production from poop.

title: Robot Taekwon V
description: A Korean robot superhero fights to protect Earth, inspired by Taekwondo martial arts.

title: Padak
description: A mackerel from the ocean ends up in a tank with other fish, where she refuses to give up her dream of freedom.
